DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure HER2 Measurement IHC Test Outcome
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The result of HER2 genetic immunohistochemistry analysis.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure HER 2 Measurement IHC Test
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The determination of the amount of human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 present in a sample._A diagnostic test in which an antibody is used to link a cellular antigen specifically to a stain that can be seen with a microscope.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Concepts.longName: Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 Measurement
Concepts.definition: The determination of the amount of human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 present in a sample.
A diagnostic test in which an antibody is used to link a cellular antigen specifically to a stain that can be seen with a microscope.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 present in a sample._A diagnostic test in which an antibody is used to link a cellular antigen specifically to a stain that can be seen with a microscope._The result of an action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

Concepts.definition: Data from an original source is not present, accessible or ready for use or service.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

Concepts.definition: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a reason or result cannot be established.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a reason or result cannot be established.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An immunohistochemical result of 2+ for HER2/Neu expression that is considered equivocal for expression.

Concepts.definition: An immunohistochemical result of 2+ for HER2/Neu expression that is considered equivocal for expression.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a test was not performed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a test was not performed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An immunohistochemical result of 0 for HER2/Neu expression that is considered negative for expression.

Concepts.definition: An immunohistochemical result of 0 for HER2/Neu expression that is considered negative for expression.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An immunohistochemical result of 1+ for HER2/Neu expression that is considered negative for expression.

Concepts.definition: An immunohistochemical result of 1+ for HER2/Neu expression that is considered negative for expression.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An immunohistochemical result of 3+ for HER2/Neu expression that is considered positive for expression.

Concepts.definition: An immunohistochemical result of 3+ for HER2/Neu expression that is considered positive for expression.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

Deleted Not done, added Not tested. Per MCL PCA breast DCT. 11/30/21 mr Added Cannot be determined; changed primary name from Borderline (2+) to Equivocal (2+) per MCL PCA breast DCT.   5/23/19 edits to Rep Term, Long Name; tt. 5/20/19 jk created for Initial Diagnosis module; added CSI for diagnosis and surgical therapy.
